moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Bullet Punch
moves.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: X-Scissor
moves.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Double Hit
moves.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.
